value:
$WmMPID_ルキナ,ch04_01_Lucina_F_Normal,Face|$w0|That enmity in the air... This is just
like MY future, where I came from!
It's all so similar...$k$p

$WmMPID_ウード,ch04_20_Eudes_M_Normal,Face|$w0|I am too legendary to die, anyway. I
won't quit. I'll catch up! We'll return
to Ylisse together!$k$p

$WmMPID_ジェローム,ch04_21_Jerome_M_Normal,Face|$w0|I'm staying too. Minerva wishes to
fight for Lucina. She told me as much
before.$k$pShe insists we meet our destinies
together.$k$p

$WmMPID_マーク男,ch04_22_Marc_M_Normal,Face|$w0|You will not sway me from my
master!$k$pIf you insist on interfering, I swear I
will destroy you!$k$p

$WmMPID_マーク女,ch04_24_Marc_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Master Grima, I'll never betray you.
I'll stay by your side no matter what
form you take.$k$p

$WmMPID_伝承ルフレ女,ch04_08_Reflet_F_Legend01,Face|$w0|I am Grima... I will grant you no
escape from this coil of despair.$k$pEach and every one of you is
destined to die here and now.$k$p
